ValidationRule.description: Check If Editable Measure code is not Empty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "editable", ISBLANK(cgcloud__Editable_Measure_Code__c)), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "editable_calculated", ISBLANK(cgcloud__Editable_Measure_Code__c), cgcloud__Compound_Main__c == TRUE) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Editable Measure Code must not be empty for editable KPIs and for editable_calculated KPIs which are the compound main.
